snippet.title: Stand By Me | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ A groovy physics game about the adventures of Pico in a magnetic land.

In Stand By Me, play as the curious and adventurous Pico as he travels through a fantastic and ever-changing geometric land with the aid of its many magnetic denizens – and help him find at long last what he's searching for.

💠 Wishlist it on Steam! https://bit.ly/wishlistsbm
